event.title: April 23, 2009, the Florida Department of Education took over

data.event: On April 23, 2009, the Florida Department of Education took over financial oversight of the district.
In June 2011, the District exited financial emergency one (1) year sooner than expected due to hard work and sacrifice of the part of District faculty and staff.
The District has now operated for two years with a fund balance well over the mandated 3%.

event.title: won the State Championship in Football in 2012

data.event: The Jefferson County Tigers won the State Championship in Football in 2012.
